meanings: little girl employed at a brothel
on reading compounds: 禿げ頭【ハゲアタマ】bald head, baldness
kun reading compounds: 禿びる【ちびる】to get blunt, to dull, to wear out
禿【はげ】baldness, bald head, children's hairstyle of short untied hair, children with short untied hair, young girl working as a servant for a high-class prostitute (Edo period), idiot, moron
禿げる【はげる】to lose hair, to become bald, to become bare (e.g. a mountain becomes bare of trees)
